nodes.text: Not children. We wouldn't think of harming them. No. These are the Children of the Cathedral. A nasty group of people.
Suit yourself. If they take over the wastelands, don't say we  didn't warn you.
I am . I come in peace.
They are a strong lot, but I think with someone of your skills, you will be able to get in and help us destroy them.
Would you? That would be wonderful.
A cynic in our midst. I am sure you have your reasons. Regardless, I am certain we can bring about some type of understanding.
I am . Your destroyer.
You must be right. Thank you for setting me straight.
Me . You dead.
Be that as it may, your opinion was not requested. Goodbye.
The Children are an occult group who worship some dark god. Personally, I think there is something about them that reeks of evil.
We are working to bring about tolerance to those in the wastelands for those few unfortunates who have been mutated by man's destructive nature.
Not really. The only thing I can think of is that the person would have to have access to some information and have access to the outside. You might want to look to the initiates or scouts.
You are right in saying that we, as humans, have been close-minded. However, there is always hope.
Nicole will be pleased, then, to know that I killed the agent.
We are the Followers of the Apocalypse. We are trying to bring peace  to the wastelands.
I think you are the double agent. Trying to trick me, I see. Well now  you DIE!
I've heard that the Children have been able to get some of our secrets. I wonder how that is happening?
Me . Me hep.
Me . Me go.
Do you see to end the evil of the Children?
Excellent! Go talk to Nicole and she will be able to tell you how  you can help us.
Me kill!
If you talk to Nicole, she will be able to tell you more of what can be done to stop them.
Truly? I thought as much myself, but feared that I would never have been able to get much support on the theory.
Great job on wasting that agent. Now we might have a chance against  those Children.

links.text: What can you tell me about these Children?
Oh. I thought you were talking about kids. Nevermind. I don't think  I'll help.
In that case, sure - I'll waste them.
Who are the Followers?
No. I don't think I will help.
I'll do it, then.
There you go. Maybe that will help you on your fighting.
Good luck to you then. Goodbye.
Who are the Followers?
I will kill them.
I don't know. They sound too strong for me.
Forget it! There is no way I will help you.
What can I do to help?
That's just a bunch of bull.
In all of history, we have never been able to get tolerance. Why do you think the War happened?
Good luck with that, then.
Thanks. Goodbye.
Good luck to you, then.
I think you are right. Here, let me make you more open-minded with this.
That seems highly unlikely.
How do you plan on doing that?
Sounds like a good idea. Good luck with it.
Huh?
I believe that there is a spy somewhere around here.
Huh?
I know. I am selling your secrets to them.
Huh?
I am sure you are just imagining things. How can they know anything?
Huh?
Yes. I want to wipe out those scum.
Who are these Children?
Why would I want to kill children?
No. I'd rather kill you wimps.
Thank you. Goodbye.
I'm glad to know that. Thanks for your time.
You are the double agent!!!
Do you have any clues as to who it could be?
Huh?
I can help train you to become more efficient in your fighting.
Huh?
Huh?
Huh?
Good luck to you.
